entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
